text: The residence or situs of the fiduciary shall not control the classification of estates and trusts as resident or nonresident under the provisions of § 47- 1809.01.
historical:

Current through December 11, 2012
credits: (July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 347, ch. 258, art. I, title IX, § 2; enacted, Apr. 9, 1997, D.C. Law 11-254, § 2, 44 DCR 1575.)

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Tax on Estates and Trusts. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Tax on estates and trusts--Effect of residence or situs of fiduciary.
